name: Starblast: 3D Wars
description:
Get ready to blast your way through the galaxy with Starblast: 3D Wars - the ultimate 2.5D twin-stick shooter that's here to take your gaming experience to new heights!

Featuring stunning, colorful graphics and 8 exhilarating modes, this game will keep you on the edge of your seat for hours on end. Take your pick from various modes, including "Mortality", where you have 3 lives and you must score as high as possible before you lose them all, "Deadline", which gives you 5 minutes to get the highest score with infinite lives, and "Shotgun", where you can unleash a unique bullet pattern that will leave your enemies reeling.

You'll be facing off against rapidly spawning enemies, each type having it's own "Gimmick"...

With intuitive controls and fast-paced action, Starblast: 3D Wars is perfect for both casual gamers and hardcore fans of the twin-stick shooter genre. So what are you waiting for? Get ready to enter the fray and blast your way to victory!
